North_Las_Vegas.Timeline of Las Vegas:
The following is a timeline of the history of the city of Las Vegas, Nevada, United States.


== 20th century ==


=== 1900s–1950s ===

1900 – The population of Las Vegas, five years before it is founded as a city, is 22.
1905 – Las Vegas is founded as a city on May 15 when 110 acres (45 ha) of land adjacent to the Union Pacific Railroad tracks are auctioned off by the railroad company.
